Room.Text: *I'm in front of the FUN HOUSE
*I'm on a ledge over a deep pit

ADVENT.Message: Good thing this ropes not too long
I see a bunch of clay pigeons
Splash, Oh no I am all washed up!
Ticket lady rips up bill and says '$5 grocery bill ain't money bub!'
I see a hidden door in it
Park closes at midnight. Shoes required at all times. Management NOT responsible for accidents!! CAUTION this park is DANGERous!
I can see myself thin,fat and tall
Welcome to ADVENTURE 7, 'MYSTERY FUN HOUSE' by Scott Adams Dedicated to Marin Computer Center.
She thanks me and turns a hidden knob
She's pretty, but has really snarled hair!
A mermaid swims by and waves
Sizzle, it burns with a dull glow.
It collapsed into a pile of bones
Calliope is so LOUD I can't hear clearly!
Tiny piece of hemp falls on my head and vanishes!
Fire ladder retracts and leaves me here!
Ticket lady asks me what I want
I see a shiny COIN at the bottom of the drain!
I can't reach it, my arm is too short!
Only thing left is one bare branch
Say again and use a color
Wall swings me around and I'm elsewhere...
James: We must get the plans back by tonight! We believe they're hiddenwithin his Fun House! Signed, M P.S. Q says enjoy the gum!
HUH? Why do you want me to MARRY?
Guard hears explosion and shoots me!
Moving ride throws me off balance
Gentle air blast blows up my leg.
Hard blast of air rips my body apart
I see into the mirror room
There's a catwalk above the ride

Item.Text: Strange knobs on wall: Yellow, Green, Blue
Open door with small shelves beyond
Valve on a large warm pipe
Pole coming out of horse's back
Window. Gun pointing into and mounted by window
